title: Health Data Integration Compliance
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead, I want standardized APIs for health device data ingestion so that I can ensure that our applications maintain compliance-by-design principles while integrating health data securely and efficiently.

title: Customizable Health Monitoring Alerts
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to enable developers to design user-customizable alert preferences for health monitoring so that users can receive timely health notifications while maintaining compliance with privacy regulations.

title: Telehealth Integration for Compliance and Auditability
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that telehealth services within the ALFRED system maintain regulatory compliance and provide clear audit trails, so that we can build trust with users and ensure data privacy while delivering effective care.

title: Medication Management Interface – Caregiver Notification for Missed Doses
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that the medication management interface includes robust audit logs and secure API designs for caregiver notifications so that we can maintain compliance while facilitating timely interventions for users.

title: Secure Access Controls for Sensitive Information
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that users have secure access to their health history with comprehensive audit logs so that we maintain compliance and privacy while enabling effective personalized care.
